message.msgstr: Please enter password provided by operators
Registering to the OLT.
Failed to register to the OLT.
Registering to the OLT. Please check LOID and password!
Registering to the OLT(LOID error). Please check LOID and password!
Registering to the OLT(logic password error). Please check LOID and password!
Registering to the OLT(LOID conflict). Please check LOID and password!
Registering to the OLT(Physical SN conflict). Please check the input!
Registering to the OLT(NO RESOURCE), please retry!
Registering to the OLT(ONU type error)
Registering to the OLT(Physical SN error). Please check the input!
Registering to the OLT(Physical password error). Please check the input!
Registering to the OLT(Physical password conflict). Please check the input!
Registering to the OLT, please retry!
Last service distribution isn't complete, please re-register after visiting WEB and restore all configuration.
Activation timeout.
You have successfully registered, without re-registering.
You have successfully registered, without re-registering. To re-register, please restore all the configuration and then try again.
Obtaining IP address of management channel.
Failed to obtain IP address of management channel.
Obtain IP address of management channel success.
Please retry(the rest number to attempt:
You have tried the max number of certification, please contact customer service!
Registration successful. Waiting for service distribution.
Registration successful.
Registration successful. Service is being distributed.
Registration successful. Service distribution successful.
Failed to distribute service.
User password doesn't exist!
User LOID doesn't exist!
User LOID and password match failed!
Password doesn't exist!
Being registered with the ACS.
